data.displayName: Business Balance Plan 12 - Demand with CL 1 & 2

fees.description: $12.00 (GST does not currently apply to late payment fees).
Credit card merchant service fee of 0.36% for all payments with Visa or Mastercard.
Credit card merchant service fee of 1.5% for all payments with American Express.
A disconnection fee may apply  (incl. moving or reading your meter). Fees may vary and see additional fee information for details.
A reconnection fee may apply (incl. moving or reading your meter). Fees may vary and see additional fee information for details.
A connection fee may apply when you move into a property.  Fees may vary and see additional fee information for more details.

electricityContract.terms: Please refer to our website www.energyaustralia.com.au for full terms and conditions.

discounts.description: Discount applies to GST exclusive market energy charges, and not to fees and other charges such as late payment fees or Greenpower.

electricityContract.variation: Prices may be varied in line with your terms and conditions. We will give you notice before any new prices take effect.

demandCharges.description: Demand charges are applied to the maximum half hourly kW power reading (maximum quarter hourly for 15 minute meters) within the billing period. The chargeable kW reading occurs between 7am to 5pm on weekdays. The demand charge is in cents per KW per day and is calculated on the number of days in the billing period.

singleRate.description: Separately metered usage. The hours of application are determined by your Distributor.
Separately metered usage. The hours of application are determined by your Distributor.

solarFeedInTariff.description: EnergyAustralia Retailer Feed-in Tariff (incl. GST if any)
solarFeedInTariff.displayName: EnergyAustralia Retailer Feed-in Tariff (incl. GST if any)

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: The Benefit Period for this plan is 12 months. We will provide you with notice of your options prior to the end of the Benefit Period. Your contract will continue until it is ended by either party.
electricityContract.additionalFeeInformation: Additional fees and charges may apply. Please refer to www.energyaustralia.com.au/conditions-and-pricing/other-charges.
